t: Introducing Amazon Clinic, a virtual health service that delivers convenient, affordable care for common conditions
s: November 15, 2022 - Amazon Clinic will operate in 32 states and provide virtual care for more than 20 common health conditions, such as allergies, acne, and hair loss.

t: Amazon has another exclusive OTC drug brand: 4 things to know - Becker's Hospital Review | Healthcare News & Analysis
s: November 7, 2018 - Amazon, through a partnership with generic store brand pharmaceutical maker Aurohealth, will launch a fourth exclusive over-the-counter medication brand called Primary Health, according to TJI Research.

t: Amazon consolidates Clinic telehealth service into Amazon One Medical offering
s: June 27, 2024 - Amazon Clinic had operated separately under the Amazon Health umbrella, which includes One Medical and Amazon Pharmacy.
